summary: This document consists of email correspondence related to a subpoena issued by the Southern District of New York (SDNY). It discusses the need for responsive documents regarding a real estate transaction and clarifies the correct name of an entity involved. The communication involves attorneys and an Assistant United States Attorney.

persons.name: Martha Prizio
persons.context: Martha Prizio is mentioned as an attorney corresponding with the client regarding the SDNY subpoena.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An Assistant United States Attorney is involved in the correspondence, requesting documents related to the subpoena.

connections.description: Martha Prizio is representing a client in correspondence with the Assistant United States Attorney regarding the subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued by the SDNY seeking non-privileged materials regarding a real estate transaction.

keyFacts: The document contains email correspondence regarding a subpoena from the Southern District of New York.
Martha Prizio is identified as an attorney involved in the case.
The correct name of the entity involved in the subpoena is clarified as Granite Reality LLC.
The correspondence emphasizes the importance of verifying wire instructions to avoid fraud.
An Assistant United States Attorney is actively seeking documents related to a real estate transaction.
